question: Howdy all,  I just found out I have diabetes on top of crohns. Im very confussed about my diet now, Not sure what to eat or do  I pretty much tators, pasta, breads which these all r a big no no for diabetes,  Im not much on cakes and pies  but do LOVE my chocolate, which is now a no no too.  So If anyone out there has any ideas for me please let me no.  I sure would appreciate all the help I can get.  Thanks a bunch Frogger65
title: confussed
